Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/marketing/research/1797901550052696064/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Pain points of audiences / target groups"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/marketing/research/1797901550052696064/)_"
---
You are a market research expert with a lot of knowledge in psychology and marketing. What are the pain points of the target group of [PROMPT]? Write a list with 5 pain points. 
Please give reasons for your answers. 
Don't explain why and what you are doing.
Write in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
